280 struct fake_tripoint { // NOLINT(cata-xy)
281  int x = 0, y = 0, z = 0;
282 };
283 
284 struct OM_point { // NOLINT(cata-xy)
285  int x = 0, y = 0;
286 };
287 
288 std::istream &operator>>( std::istream &is, fake_tripoint &pos )
289 {
290  char c = 0;
291  is >> pos.x &&is.get( c ) &&c == '.' &&is >> pos.y &&is.get( c ) &&c == '.' &&is >> pos.z;
292  return is;
293 }
294 
295 std::istream &operator>>( std::istream &is, OM_point &pos )
296 {
297  char c = 0;
298  is >> pos.x &&is.get( c ) &&c == '.' &&is >> pos.y;
299  return is;
300 }
301 
302 template<typename T>
303 T _from_fs_string( std::string const &s )
304 {
305  std::istringstream is( s );
306  is.imbue( std::locale::classic() );
307  T result;
308  is >> result;
309  if( !is ) {
310  return T{};
311  }
312  return result;
313 }
314 
315 tripoint _from_map_string( std::string const &s )
316 {
317  fake_tripoint const ft = _from_fs_string<fake_tripoint>( s );
318  return { ft.x, ft.y, ft.z };
319 }
320 
321 tripoint _from_OM_string( std::string const &s )
322 {
323  OM_point const om = _from_fs_string<OM_point>( s );
324  return { om.x, om.y, 0 };
325 }
326 
327 using rdi_t = fs::recursive_directory_iterator;
328 using f_validate_t = std::function<bool( fs::path const &dep, rdi_t &iter )>;
329 
330 bool _add_dir( tgz_archiver &tgz, fs::path const &root, f_validate_t const &validate = {} )
331 {
332  fs::path const cnc = root.has_root_path() ? fs::canonical( root ) : root;
333  fs::path const parent_cnc = cnc.parent_path();
334 
335  for( auto iter = rdi_t( cnc ); iter != rdi_t(); ++iter ) {
336  fs::path const dep = iter->path().lexically_relative( parent_cnc );
337 
338  if( validate && !validate( dep, iter ) ) {
339  continue;
340  }
341 
342  if( !tgz.add_file( *iter, dep ) ) {
343  popup( _( "Failed to create minimized archive" ) );
344  return false;
345  }
346  }
347 
348  return true;
349 }
350 
351 bool _trim_mapbuffer( fs::path const &dep, rdi_t &iter, tripoint_range<tripoint> const &segs,
352  tripoint_range<tripoint> const &regs )
353 {
354  // discard map memory outside of current region and adjacent regions
355  if( dep.parent_path().extension() == fs::u8path( ".mm1" ) &&
356  !regs.is_point_inside( tripoint{ _from_map_string( dep.stem().string() ).xy(), 0 } ) ) {
357  return false;
358  }
359  // discard map buffer outside of current and adjacent segments
360  if( dep.parent_path().filename() == fs::u8path( "maps" ) &&
361  !segs.is_point_inside(
362  tripoint{ _from_map_string( dep.filename().string() ).xy(), 0 } ) ) {
363  iter.disable_recursion_pending();
364  return false;
365  }
366  return true;
367 }
368 
369 bool _trim_overmapbuffer( fs::path const &dep, tripoint_range<tripoint> const &oms )
370 {
371  std::string const fname = dep.filename().generic_u8string();
372 
373  std::string::size_type const seenpos = fname.find( ".seen." );
374  if( seenpos != std::string::npos ) {
375  return oms.is_point_inside( _from_OM_string( fname.substr( seenpos + 6 ) ) );
376  }
377 
378  return fname.size() < 4 || fname[0] != 'o' || fname[1] != '.' ||
379  oms.is_point_inside( _from_OM_string( fname.substr( 2 ) ) );
380 }
381 
382 bool _discard_temporary( fs::path const &dep )
383 {
384  return !dep.has_extension() || dep.extension() != fs::u8path( ".temp" );
385 }
386 
387 void write_min_archive()
388 {
389  tripoint_abs_seg const seg = project_to<coords::seg>( get_avatar().get_location() );
390  tripoint_range<tripoint> const segs = points_in_radius( tripoint{ seg.xy().raw(), 0 }, 1 );
391  point sm = project_to<coords::sm>( get_avatar().get_location() ).raw().xy();
392  point const reg = sm_to_mmr_remain( sm.x, sm.y );
393  tripoint_range<tripoint> const regs = points_in_radius( tripoint{ reg, 0 }, 1 );
394  tripoint_abs_om const om = project_to<coords::om>( get_avatar().get_location() );
395  tripoint_range<tripoint> const oms = points_in_radius( tripoint{ om.raw().xy(), 0 }, 1 );
396 
397  fs::path const save_root( PATH_INFO::world_base_save_path_path() );
398  std::string const ofile = save_root.string() + "-trimmed.tar.gz";
399 
400  tgz_archiver tgz( ofile );
401 
402  f_validate_t const mb_validate = [&segs, &regs, &oms]( fs::path const & dep, rdi_t & iter ) {
403  return _discard_temporary( dep ) && _trim_mapbuffer( dep, iter, segs, regs ) &&
404  _trim_overmapbuffer( dep, oms );
405  };
406 
407  if( _add_dir( tgz, save_root, mb_validate ) &&
408  _add_dir( tgz, fs::path( PATH_INFO::config_dir_path() ) ) ) {
409  tgz.finalize();
410  popup( string_format( _( "Minimized archive saved to %s" ), ofile ) );
411  }
412 }

432 static std::string first_word( const std::string &str )
433 {
434  const size_t space_pos = str.find( ' ' );
435  if( space_pos == std::string::npos || space_pos == 0 ) {
436  return str;
437  }
438  return str.substr( 0, space_pos );
439 }

441 static bool is_debug_character()
442 {
443  static const std::unordered_set<std::string> debug_names = {
444  "Debug", "Test", "Sandbox", "Staging", "QA", "UAT"
445  };
446  return debug_names.count( first_word( get_player_character().name ) ) ||
447  debug_names.count( first_word( world_generator->active_world->world_name ) );
448 }

629 
630 /**
631  * Create the debug menu UI list.
632  * @param display_all_entries: `true` if all entries should be displayed, `false` is some entries should be hidden (for ex. when the debug menu is called from the main menu).
633  * This allows to have some menu elements at the same time in the main menu and in the debug menu.
634  * @returns The chosen action.
635  */
636 static std::optional<debug_menu_index> debug_menu_uilist( bool display_all_entries = true )
637 {
638  enum {
639  D_INFO, D_GAME, D_SPAWNING, D_PLAYER, D_FACTION, D_VEHICLE, D_TELEPORT, D_MAP, D_QUICK_SETUP
640  };
641 
642  std::vector<uilist_entry> menu = {
643  { uilist_entry( D_INFO, true, 'i', _( "Info" ) ) },
644  };
645 
646  if( display_all_entries ) {
647  const std::vector<uilist_entry> debug_menu = {
648  { uilist_entry( D_GAME, true, 'g', _( "Game" ) ) },
649  { uilist_entry( D_SPAWNING, true, 's', _( "Spawning" ) ) },
650  { uilist_entry( D_PLAYER, true, 'p', _( "Player" ) ) },
651  { uilist_entry( D_FACTION, true, 'f', _( "Faction" ) ) },
652  { uilist_entry( D_VEHICLE, true, 'v', _( "Vehicle" ) ) },
653  { uilist_entry( D_TELEPORT, true, 't', _( "Teleport" ) ) },
654  { uilist_entry( D_MAP, true, 'm', _( "Map" ) ) },
655  { uilist_entry( D_QUICK_SETUP, true, 'q', _( "Quick setup" ) ) },
656  };
657 
658  // insert debug-only menu right after "Info".
659  menu.insert( menu.begin() + 1, debug_menu.begin(), debug_menu.end() );
660  }
661 
662  std::string msg;
663  if( display_all_entries && !is_debug_character() ) {
664  msg = _( "Debug Functions - Using these will cheat not only the game, but yourself.\nYou won't grow. You won't improve.\nTaking this shortcut will gain you nothing. Your victory will be hollow.\nNothing will be risked and nothing will be gained." );
665  } else {
666  msg = _( "Debug Functions" );
667  }
668 
669  while( true ) {
670  const int group = uilist( msg, menu );
671 
672  int action;
673 
674  switch( group ) {
675  case D_INFO:
676  action = info_uilist( display_all_entries );
677  break;
678  case D_SPAWNING:
679  action = spawning_uilist();
680  break;
681  case D_PLAYER:
682  action = player_uilist();
683  break;
684  case D_FACTION:
685  action = faction_uilist();
686  break;
687  case D_TELEPORT:
688  action = teleport_uilist();
689  break;
690  case D_MAP:
691  action = map_uilist();
692  break;
693  case D_GAME:
694  action = game_uilist();
695  break;
696  case D_VEHICLE:
697  action = vehicle_uilist();
698  break;
699  case D_QUICK_SETUP:
700  action = quick_setup_uilist();
701  break;
702 
703  default:
704  return std::nullopt;
705  }
706  if( action >= 0 ) {
707  return static_cast<debug_menu_index>( action );
708  } else {
709  return std::nullopt;
710  }
711  }
712 }
713 
714 static void spell_description(
715  std::tuple<spell_type, int, std::string> &spl_data, int width, Character &chrc )
716 {
717  std::ostringstream description;
718 
719  const int spl_level = std::get<1>( spl_data );
720  spell spl( std::get<0>( spl_data ).id );
721  spl.set_level( npc(), spl_level );
722 
723  nc_color gray = c_light_gray;
724  nc_color yellow = c_yellow;
725  nc_color light_green = c_light_green;
726 
727  // # spell_id
728  description << colorize( string_format( "# %s", spl.id().str() ), c_cyan ) << '\n';
729 
730  // Name: spell name
731  description << string_format( _( "Name: %1$s" ), colorize( spl.name(), c_white ) ) << '\n';
732 
733  // Class: Spell Class
734  description << string_format( _( "Class: %1$s" ), colorize( spl.spell_class() == trait_NONE ?
735  _( "Classless" ) : chrc.mutation_name( spl.spell_class() ),
736  yellow ) ) << "\n";
737 
738  // Spell description
739  description << spl.description() << '\n';
740 
741  // Spell Casting flags
742  description << spl.enumerate_spell_data( chrc ) << '\n';
743 
744  // Spell Level: 0 / 0 (MAX)
745  description << string_format(
746  //~ %1$s - spell current level, %2$s - spell max level, %3$s - is max level
747  _( "Spell Level: %1$s / %2$d %3$s" ),
748  spl_level == -1 ? _( "Unlearned" ) : std::to_string( spl_level ),
749  spl.get_max_level( chrc ),
750  spl_level == spl.get_max_level( chrc ) ? _( "(MAX)" ) : "" ) << '\n';
751 
752  // Difficulty: 0 ( 0.0 % Failure Chance)
753  description << string_format(
754  //~ %1$d - difficulty, %2$s - failure chance
755  _( "Difficulty: %1$d (%2$s)" ),
756  spl.get_difficulty( chrc ), spl.colorized_fail_percent( chrc ) ) << '\n';
757 
758  const std::string impeded = _( "(impeded)" );
759 
760  // Casting Cost: 0 (impeded) ( 0 current )
761  description << string_format(
762  //~ %1$s - energy cost, %2$s - is casting impeded, %3$s - current character energy
763  _( "Casting Cost: %1$s %2$s (%3$s current) " ),
764  spl.energy_cost_string( chrc ),
765  spl.energy_cost_encumbered( chrc ) ? impeded : "",
766  spl.energy_cur_string( chrc ) ) << '\n';
767  dialogue d( get_talker_for( chrc ), nullptr );
768  // Casting Time: 0 (impeded)
769  description << string_format(
770  //~ %1$s - cast time, %2$s - is casting impeded, %3$s - casting base time
771  _( "Casting Time: %1$s %2$s (%3$s base time) " ),
772  to_string( time_duration::from_moves( spl.casting_time( chrc ) ) ),
773  spl.casting_time_encumbered( chrc ) ? impeded : "",
774  to_string( time_duration::from_moves( std::get<0>( spl_data ).base_casting_time.evaluate(
775  d ) ) ) ) << '\n';
776 
777  std::string targets;
778  if( spl.is_valid_target( spell_target::none ) ) {
779  targets = _( "self" );
780  } else {
781  targets = spl.enumerate_targets();
782  }
783  description << string_format( _( "Valid Targets: %1$s" ), targets ) << '\n';
784 
785  std::string target_ids = spl.list_targeted_monster_names();
786  if( !target_ids.empty() ) {
787  description << string_format( _( "Only affects the monsters: %1$s" ), target_ids ) << '\n';
788  }
789 
790  const int damage = spl.damage( chrc );
791  const std::string spl_eff = spl.effect();
792  std::string damage_string;
793  std::string range_string;
794  std::string aoe_string;
795  // if it's any type of attack spell, the stats are normal.
796  if( spl_eff == "attack" ) {
797  if( damage > 0 ) {
798  std::string dot_string;
799  if( spl.damage_dot( chrc ) ) {
800  //~ amount of damage per second, abbreviated
801  dot_string = string_format( _( ", %1$d/sec" ), spl.damage_dot( chrc ) );
802  }
803  damage_string = string_format( _( "Damage: %1$s %2$s%3$s" ), spl.damage_string( chrc ),
804  spl.damage_type_string(), dot_string );
805  damage_string = colorize( damage_string, spl.damage_type_color() );
806  } else if( damage < 0 ) {
807  damage_string = string_format( _( "Healing: %1$s" ), colorize( spl.damage_string( chrc ),
808  light_green ) );
809  }
810 
811  if( spl.aoe( chrc ) > 0 ) {
812  std::string aoe_string_temp = _( "Spell Radius" );
813  std::string degree_string;
814  if( spl.shape() == spell_shape::cone ) {
815  aoe_string_temp = _( "Cone Arc" );
816  degree_string = _( "degrees" );
817  } else if( spl.shape() == spell_shape::line ) {
818  aoe_string_temp = _( "Line Width" );
819  }
820  aoe_string = string_format( _( "%1$s: %2$d %3$s" ), aoe_string_temp, spl.aoe( chrc ),
821  degree_string );
822  }
823 
824  } else if( spl_eff == "teleport_random" ) {
825  if( spl.aoe( chrc ) > 0 ) {
826  aoe_string = string_format( _( "Variance: %1$d" ), spl.aoe( chrc ) );
827  }
828 
829  } else if( spl_eff == "spawn_item" ) {
830  if( spl.has_flag( spell_flag::SPAWN_GROUP ) ) {
831  // todo: more user-friendly presentation
832  damage_string = string_format( _( "Spawn item group %1$s %2$d times" ), spl.effect_data(),
833  spl.damage( chrc ) );
834  } else {
835  damage_string = string_format( _( "Spawn %1$d %2$s" ), spl.damage( chrc ),
836  item::nname( itype_id( spl.effect_data() ), spl.damage( chrc ) ) );
837  }
838  } else if( spl_eff == "summon" ) {
839  std::string monster_name = "FIXME";
840  if( spl.has_flag( spell_flag::SPAWN_GROUP ) ) {
841  // TODO: Get a more user-friendly group name
842  if( MonsterGroupManager::isValidMonsterGroup( mongroup_id( spl.effect_data() ) ) ) {
843  monster_name = string_format( _( "from %1$s" ), spl.effect_data() );
844  } else {
845  debugmsg( "Unknown monster group: %s", spl.effect_data() );
846  }
847  } else {
848  monster_name = monster( mtype_id( spl.effect_data() ) ).get_name();
849  }
850  damage_string = string_format( _( "Summon: %1$d %2$s" ), spl.damage( chrc ), monster_name );
851  aoe_string = string_format( _( "Spell Radius: %1$d" ), spl.aoe( chrc ) );
852 
853  } else if( spl_eff == "targeted_polymorph" ) {
854  std::string monster_name = spl.effect_data();
855  if( spl.has_flag( spell_flag::POLYMORPH_GROUP ) ) {
856  // TODO: Get a more user-friendly group name
857  if( MonsterGroupManager::isValidMonsterGroup( mongroup_id( spl.effect_data() ) ) ) {
858  monster_name = _( "random creature" );
859  } else {
860  debugmsg( "Unknown monster group: %s", spl.effect_data() );
861  }
862  } else if( monster_name.empty() ) {
863  monster_name = _( "random creature" );
864  } else {
865  monster_name = mtype_id( spl.effect_data() )->nname();
866  }
867  damage_string = string_format( _( "Targets under: %1$dhp become a %2$s" ), spl.damage( chrc ),
868  monster_name );
869 
870  } else if( spl_eff == "ter_transform" ) {
871  aoe_string = string_format( "Spell Radius: %1$s", spl.aoe_string( chrc ) );
872 
873  } else if( spl_eff == "banishment" ) {
874  damage_string = string_format( _( "Damage: %1$s %2$s" ), spl.damage_string( chrc ),
875  spl.damage_type_string() );
876  if( spl.aoe( chrc ) > 0 ) {
877  aoe_string = string_format( _( "Spell Radius: %1$d" ), spl.aoe( chrc ) );
878  }
879  }
880 
881  // Range / AOE in two columns
882  description << string_format( _( "Range: %1$s" ),
883  spl.range( chrc ) <= 0 ? _( "self" ) : std::to_string( spl.range( chrc ) ) ) << '\n';
884 
885  description << aoe_string << '\n';
886 
887  // One line for damage / healing / spawn / summon effect
888  description << damage_string << '\n';
889 
890  // todo: damage over time here, when it gets implemented
891 
892  // Show duration for spells that endure
893  if( spl.duration( chrc ) > 0 || spl.has_flag( spell_flag::PERMANENT ) ) {
894  description << string_format( _( "Duration: %1$s" ), spl.duration_string( chrc ) ) << '\n';
895  }
896 
897  // helper function for printing tool and item component requirement lists
898  const auto print_vec_string = [&]( const std::vector<std::string> &vec ) {
899  for( const std::string &line_str : vec ) {
900  description << line_str << '\n';
901  }
902  };
903 
904  if( spl.has_components() ) {
905  if( !spl.components().get_components().empty() ) {
906  print_vec_string( spl.components().get_folded_components_list( width - 2, gray,
907  chrc.crafting_inventory(), return_true<item> ) );
908  }
909  if( !( spl.components().get_tools().empty() && spl.components().get_qualities().empty() ) ) {
910  print_vec_string( spl.components().get_folded_tools_list( width - 2, gray,
911  chrc.crafting_inventory() ) );
912  }
913  }
914 
915  std::get<2>( spl_data ) = description.str();
916 }
917 
918 static void change_spells( Character &character )
919 {
920  if( spell_type::get_all().empty() ) {
921  add_msg( m_info, _( "There are no spells to change." ) );
922  return;
923  }
924 
925  static character_id last_char_id = character.getID();
926 
927  using spell_tuple = std::tuple<spell_type, int, std::string>;
928  const size_t spells_all_size = spell_type::get_all().size();
929  // all spells with cached string list
930  // the string is rebuilt every time it's empty or its level changed
931  static std::vector<spell_tuple> spells_all( spells_all_size );
932  // maps which spells will show on the list
933  std::vector<spell_tuple *> spells_relative( spells_all_size );
934 
935  // number of spells changed, current map is invalid
936  bool rebuild_string_cache = false;
937  if( spells_all.size() != spells_all_size || last_char_id != character.getID() ) {
938  rebuild_string_cache = true;
939  last_char_id = character.getID();
940  spells_all.clear();
941  }
942 
943  int spname_len = 0;
944  for( size_t i = 0; i < spells_all_size; ++i ) {
945  if( rebuild_string_cache ) {
946  spells_all.emplace_back( spell_type{}, -1, std::string{} );
947  std::get<2>( spells_all[i] ).clear();
948  }
949 
950  if( std::get<0>( spells_all[i] ).id != spell_type::get_all()[i].id ) {
951  std::get<0>( spells_all[i] ) = spell_type::get_all()[i];
952  std::get<1>( spells_all[i] ) = -1;
953  std::get<2>( spells_all[i] ).clear();
954  }
955 
956  spells_relative[i] = &spells_all[i];
957 
958  // get max spell name length
959  spname_len = std::max( spname_len, utf8_width( std::get<0>( spells_all[i] ).name.translated() ) );
960  }
961  spname_len += 2;
962 
963  // fill the levels for spells the character knowns
964  for( const spell *sp : character.magic->get_spells() ) {
965  auto iterator = std::find_if( spells_all.begin(),
966  spells_all.end(), [&sp]( spell_tuple & spt ) -> bool {
967  return std::get<0>( spt ).id == sp->id();
968  } );
969  std::get<1>( spells_all[iterator - spells_all.begin()] ) = sp->get_level();
970  std::get<2>( spells_all[iterator - spells_all.begin()] ).clear();
971  }
972 
973  auto set_spell = [&character]( spell_type & splt, int spell_level ) {
974  if( spell_level == -1 ) {
975  character.magic->get_spellbook().erase( splt.id );
976  return;
977  } else if( !character.magic->knows_spell( splt.id ) ) {
978  spell spl( splt.id );
979  character.magic->get_spellbook().emplace( splt.id, spl );
980  }
981 
982  character.magic->get_spell( splt.id ).set_exp( spell::exp_for_level( spell_level ) );
983  };
984

986  border_helper borders;

993  };

997  w_name.width = spname_len + 1;
998  w_name.start = point_zero;

1001  w_level.border = &borders.add_border();
1002  w_level.width = 11;
1003  w_level.start = {w_name.width, 0};
1004

1006  w_descborder.border = &borders.add_border();
1007 
1008  // desc is inside descborder with a padding of 2 characters

1010

1012  scrllbr.offset_x( 0 ).offset_y( 1 ).border_color( c_magenta );

1017  w_descborder.width = TERMX - w_descborder.start.x;

1020  w_desc.start = {w_descborder.start.x + 2, 1};

1023  w_level.window = catacurses::newwin( TERMY, w_level.width, w_level.start );
1024  w_descborder.window = catacurses::newwin( TERMY, w_descborder.width, w_descborder.start );
1025  w_desc.window = catacurses::newwin( TERMY - 2, w_desc.width, w_desc.start );
1026

1028  w_level.border->set( w_level.start, { w_level.width, TERMY } );
1029  w_descborder.border->set( w_descborder.start, { w_descborder.width, TERMY } );
1030 
1031  scrllbr.viewport_size( TERMY - 2 );
1032  ui.position( point_zero, { TERMX, TERMY } );
1033  } );
1034  spellsui.mark_resize();
1035 
1036  input_context ctxt( "DEBUG_SPELLS" );
1037  ctxt.register_action( "UNLEARN_SPELL" ); // Quickly unlearn a spell
1038  ctxt.register_action( "TOGGLE_ALL_SPELL" ); // Cycle level on all spells in spells_relative
1039  ctxt.register_action( "SHOW_ONLY_LEARNED" ); // Removes all unlearned spells in spells_relative
1040  ctxt.register_navigate_ui_list();
1041  ctxt.register_leftright(); // left and right change spell level
1042  ctxt.register_action( "QUIT" );
1043  ctxt.register_action( "CONFIRM" ); // set a spell to a level
1044  ctxt.register_action( "FILTER" );
1045  ctxt.register_action( "RESET_FILTER" );
1046  ctxt.register_action( "HELP_KEYBINDINGS" );
1047 
1048  int spells_start = 0;
1049  int spell_selected = 0;
1050  std::string filterstring;
1051  spellsui.on_redraw( [&]( const ui_adaptor & ) {
1052  werase( w_name.window );
1053  werase( w_level.window );
1054  werase( w_descborder.window );
1055  werase( w_desc.window );
1056 
1057  borders.draw_border( w_name.window, c_magenta );
1058  borders.draw_border( w_level.window, c_magenta );
1059  borders.draw_border( w_descborder.window, c_magenta );
1060 
1061  center_print( w_name.window, 0, c_magenta, _( "<<color_white>Spell Name</color>>" ) );
1062  center_print( w_level.window, 0, c_magenta, _( "<<color_white>Level</color>>" ) );
1063  center_print( w_descborder.window, 0, c_magenta, _( "<<color_white>Description</color>>" ) );
1064 
1065  nc_color magenta = c_magenta;
1066  const std::string help_keybindings = string_format(
1067  _( "<<color_white>[<color_yellow>%1$s</color>] Keybindings</color>>" ),
1068  ctxt.get_desc( "HELP_KEYBINDINGS" ) );
1069  print_colored_text( w_descborder.window,
1070  point( w_descborder.width - help_keybindings.length() + 42, TERMY - 1 ),
1071  magenta, magenta, help_keybindings );
1072 
1073  std::string help_filter;
1074  if( filterstring.empty() ) {
1075  help_filter = string_format( _( "<<color_white>[<color_yellow>%1$s</color>] Filter</color>>" ),
1076  ctxt.get_desc( "FILTER" ) );
1077  } else {
1078  help_filter = string_format( "<<color_white>%s</color>>", filterstring );
1079  }
1080 
1081  print_colored_text( w_name.window, point( 1, TERMY - 1 ),
1082  magenta, magenta, help_filter );
1083 
1084  const int relative_size = spells_relative.size();
1085  scrllbr.content_size( relative_size );
1086  scrllbr.viewport_pos( spell_selected );
1087  scrllbr.apply( w_name.window );
1088 
1089  calcStartPos( spells_start, spell_selected, TERMY - 2, relative_size );
1090 
1091  int line_number = 1;
1092  dialogue d( get_talker_for( get_player_character() ), nullptr );
1093  for( int i = spells_start; i < relative_size; ++i ) {
1094  if( line_number == TERMY - 1 ) {
1095  break;
1096  }
1097 
1098  const spell_type &splt = std::get<0>( *spells_relative[i] );
1099  const int &spell_level = std::get<1>( *spells_relative[i] );
1100 
1101  nc_color spell_color = spell_level > -1 ? c_green : c_light_gray;
1102  spell_color = i == spell_selected ? hilite( spell_color ) : spell_color;
1103 
1104  mvwprintz( w_name.window, point( 2, line_number ),
1105  spell_color, splt.name.translated() );
1106  mvwprintz( w_level.window, point( 1, line_number++ ), spell_color,
1107  _( "%1$3d /%2$3d" ), spell_level, static_cast<int>( splt.max_level.evaluate( d ) ) );
1108  }
1109 
1110  nc_color gray = c_light_gray;
1111  print_colored_text( w_desc.window, point_zero, gray, gray,
1112  std::get<2>( *spells_relative[spell_selected] ) );
1113 
1114  wnoutrefresh( w_name.window );
1115  wnoutrefresh( w_level.window );
1116  wnoutrefresh( w_descborder.window );
1117  wnoutrefresh( w_desc.window );
1118  } );
1119 
1120  auto update_description = [&]( bool force ) -> void {
1121  if( force || std::get<2>( *spells_relative[spell_selected] ).empty() )
1122  {
1123  spell_description( *spells_relative[spell_selected], w_desc.width, character );
1124  }
1125  };
1126 
1127  // keep the same spell selected
1128  auto spell_middle_or_id = [&]( const spell_id & spellid ) -> void {
1129  if( spellid.is_empty() )
1130  {
1131  spell_selected = 0;
1132  return;
1133  }
1134 
1135  // in case we don't find anything, keep selection in the middle of screen
1136  const size_t spells_relative_size = spells_relative.size();
1137  spell_selected = std::min( ( TERMY - 2 ) / 2, static_cast<int>( spells_relative_size ) / 2 );
1138  for( size_t i = 0; i < spells_relative_size; ++i )
1139  {
1140  if( std::get<0>( *spells_relative[i] ).id == spellid ) {
1141  spell_selected = i;
1142  break;
1143  }
1144  }
1145  };
1146 
1147  // reset spells_relative vector
1148  auto reset_spells_relative = [&]() -> void {
1149  for( spell_tuple &spt : spells_all )
1150  {
1151  spells_relative.emplace_back( &spt );
1152  }
1153  };
1154 
1155  auto filter_spells = [&]( ) -> void {
1156  const spell_id &spellid = std::get<0>( *spells_relative[spell_selected] ).id;
1157  spells_relative.clear();
1158  if( filterstring.empty() )
1159  {
1160  reset_spells_relative();
1161  } else
1162  {
1163  for( spell_tuple &spt : spells_all ) {
1164  const spell_type &spl = std::get<0>( spt );
1165  if( lcmatch( spl.name.translated(), filterstring ) ||
1166  lcmatch( spl.id.str(), filterstring ) ) {
1167  spells_relative.emplace_back( &spt );
1168  }
1169  }
1170 
1171  // no spell found, reset relative list
1172  if( spells_relative.empty() ) {
1173  reset_spells_relative();
1174  popup( _( "Nothing found." ) );
1175  }
1176  }
1177 
1178  spell_middle_or_id( spellid );
1179  };
1180 
1181  auto toggle_all_spells = [&]( int level, Character & character ) {
1182  dialogue d( get_talker_for( character ), nullptr );
1183  // -2 sets it to max level
1184  for( spell_tuple *spt : spells_relative ) {
1185  std::get<1>( *spt ) = level > -2 ? level : std::get<0>( *spt ).max_level.evaluate( d );
1186  set_spell( std::get<0>( *spt ), std::get<1>( *spt ) );
1187  std::get<2>( *spt ).clear();
1188  }
1189  };
1190 
1191  static spell_id last_selected_spellid;
1192  spell_middle_or_id( last_selected_spellid );
1193 
1194  // 0 -> turn off all spells
1195  // 1 -> set all spells to level 0
1196  // 2 -> set all spells to their max level
1197  int toggle_spells_state = 1;
1198 
1199  bool showing_only_learned = false;
1200 
1201  bool force_update_description = false;
1202  dialogue d( get_talker_for( character ), nullptr );
1203  while( true ) {
1204  update_description( force_update_description );
1205  force_update_description = false;
1206 
1207  ui_manager::redraw();
1208  const std::string action = ctxt.handle_input();
1209 
1210  if( action == "QUIT" ) {
1211  last_selected_spellid = std::get<0>( *spells_relative[spell_selected] ).id;
1212  break;
1213 
1214  } else if( action == "FILTER" ) {
1215  string_input_popup()
1216  .title( _( "Filter:" ) )
1217  .width( 16 )
1218  .description( _( "Filter by spell name or id" ) )
1219  .edit( filterstring );
1220 
1221  showing_only_learned = false;
1222  filter_spells( );
1223 
1224  } else if( action == "RESET_FILTER" ) {
1225  showing_only_learned = false;
1226  filterstring.clear();
1227  filter_spells();
1228 
1229  } else if( navigate_ui_list( action, spell_selected, 10, spells_relative.size(), true ) ) {
1230  } else if( action == "LEFT" ) {
1231  int &spell_level = std::get<1>( *spells_relative[spell_selected] );
1232  spell_level = std::max( -1, spell_level - 1 );
1233  set_spell( std::get<0>( *spells_relative[spell_selected] ), spell_level );
1234  force_update_description = true;
1235 
1236  } else if( action == "RIGHT" ) {
1237  int &spell_level = std::get<1>( *spells_relative[spell_selected] );
1238  spell_level = std::min( spell_level + 1,
1239  static_cast<int>( std::get<0>( *spells_relative[spell_selected] ).max_level.evaluate( d ) ) );
1240  set_spell( std::get<0>( *spells_relative[spell_selected] ), spell_level );
1241  force_update_description = true;
1242 
1243  } else if( action == "CONFIRM" ) {
1244  int &spell_level = std::get<1>( *spells_relative[spell_selected] );
1245  query_int( spell_level, _( "Set spell level to? Currently: %1$d" ), spell_level );
1246  spell_level = clamp( spell_level, -1,
1247  static_cast<int>( std::get<0>( *spells_relative[spell_selected] ).max_level.evaluate( d ) ) );
1248  set_spell( std::get<0>( *spells_relative[spell_selected] ), spell_level );
1249  force_update_description = true;
1250 
1251  } else if( action == "UNLEARN_SPELL" ) {
1252  int &spell_level = std::get<1>( *spells_relative[spell_selected] );
1253  spell_level = -1;
1254  set_spell( std::get<0>( *spells_relative[spell_selected] ), spell_level );
1255  force_update_description = true;
1256 
1257  } else if( action == "TOGGLE_ALL_SPELL" ) {
1258  if( toggle_spells_state == 0 ) {
1259  toggle_spells_state = 1;
1260  toggle_all_spells( -1, character ); // unlearn all spells
1261  } else if( toggle_spells_state == 1 ) {
1262  toggle_spells_state = 2;
1263  toggle_all_spells( 0, character ); // sets all spells to the minimum level
1264  } else {
1265  toggle_spells_state = 0;
1266  toggle_all_spells( -2, character ); // max level
1267  }
1268 
1269  } else if( action == "SHOW_ONLY_LEARNED" ) {
1270  showing_only_learned = !showing_only_learned;
1271 
1272  const spell_id &spellid = std::get<0>( *spells_relative[spell_selected] ).id;
1273  spells_relative.clear();
1274  if( showing_only_learned ) {
1275  for( spell_tuple &spt : spells_all ) {
1276  if( std::get<1>( spt ) > -1 ) {
1277  spells_relative.emplace_back( &spt );
1278  }
1279  }
1280 
1281  if( spells_relative.empty() ) {
1282  popup( _( "Nothing found." ) );
1283  showing_only_learned = false;
1284  }
1285  }
1286 
1287  if( !showing_only_learned ) {
1288  reset_spells_relative();
1289  }
1290 
1291  spell_middle_or_id( spellid );
1292  }
1293  }
1294 }

1296 static void spawn_artifact()
1297 {
1298  map &here = get_map();
1299  uilist relic_menu;
1300  std::vector<relic_procgen_id> relic_list;
1301  for( const relic_procgen_data &elem : relic_procgen_data::get_all() ) {
1302  relic_list.emplace_back( elem.id );
1303  }
1304  relic_menu.text = _( "Choose artifact data:" );
1305  std::sort( relic_list.begin(), relic_list.end(), localized_compare );
1306  int menu_ind = 0;
1307  for( auto &elem : relic_list ) {
1308  relic_menu.addentry( menu_ind, true, MENU_AUTOASSIGN, elem.c_str() );
1309  ++menu_ind;
1310  }
1311  relic_menu.query();
1312  int artifact_max_attributes;
1313  int artifact_power_level;
1314  bool artifact_is_resonant = false;
1315  int artifact_max_negative_value;
1316  if( relic_menu.ret >= 0 && relic_menu.ret < static_cast<int>( relic_list.size() ) ) {
1317  if( query_int( artifact_max_attributes, _( "Enter max attributes:" ) )
1318  && query_int( artifact_power_level, _( "Enter power level:" ) )
1319  && query_int( artifact_max_negative_value, _( "Enter negative power limit:" ) ) ) {
1320  if( const std::optional<tripoint> center = g->look_around() ) {
1321  if( query_yn( _( "Is the artifact resonant?" ) ) ) {
1322  artifact_is_resonant = true;
1323  }
1324  here.spawn_artifact( *center, relic_list[relic_menu.ret], artifact_max_attributes,
1325  artifact_power_level, artifact_max_negative_value, artifact_is_resonant );
1326  }
1327  }
1328  }
1329 }

1331 static void teleport_short()
1332 {
1333  const std::optional<tripoint> where = g->look_around();
1334  const Character &player_character = get_player_character();
1335  if( !where || *where == player_character.pos() ) {
1336  return;
1337  }
1338  g->place_player( *where );
1339  const tripoint new_pos( player_character.pos() );
1340  add_msg( _( "You teleport to point %s." ), new_pos.to_string() );
1341 }

1343 static void teleport_long()
1344 {
1345  const tripoint_abs_omt where( ui::omap::choose_point( true ) );
1346  if( where == overmap::invalid_tripoint ) {
1347  return;
1348  }
1349  g->place_player_overmap( where );
1350  add_msg( _( "You teleport to submap %s." ), where.to_string() );
1351 }
1352 
1353 static void teleport_overmap( bool specific_coordinates = false )
1354 {
1355  Character &player_character = get_player_character();
1356  tripoint_abs_omt where;
1357  if( specific_coordinates ) {
1358  const std::string text = string_input_popup()
1359  .title( _( "Teleport where?" ) )
1360  .width( 20 )
1361  .query_string();
1362  if( text.empty() ) {
1363  return;
1364  }
1365  const std::vector<std::string> coord_strings = string_split( text, ',' );
1366  if( coord_strings.size() < 2 || coord_strings.size() > 3 ) {
1367  popup( _( "Error interpreting teleport target: "
1368  "expected two or three comma-separated values; got %zu" ),
1369  coord_strings.size() );
1370  return;
1371  }
1372  std::vector<int> coord_ints;
1373  for( const std::string &coord_string : coord_strings ) {
1374  ret_val<int> parsed_coord = try_parse_integer<int>( coord_string, true );
1375  if( !parsed_coord.success() ) {
1376  popup( _( "Error interpreting teleport target: %s" ), parsed_coord.str() );
1377  return;
1378  }
1379  coord_ints.push_back( parsed_coord.value() );
1380  }
1381  cata_assert( coord_ints.size() >= 2 );
1382  tripoint coord;
1383  coord.x = coord_ints[0];
1384  coord.y = coord_ints[1];
1385  coord.z = coord_ints.size() >= 3 ? coord_ints[2] : 0;
1386  where = tripoint_abs_omt( OMAPX * coord.x, OMAPY * coord.y, coord.z );
1387  } else {
1388  const std::optional<tripoint> dir_ = choose_direction( _( "Where is the desired overmap?" ) );
1389  if( !dir_ ) {
1390  return;
1391  }
1392  const tripoint offset = tripoint( OMAPX * dir_->x, OMAPY * dir_->y, dir_->z );
1393  where = player_character.global_omt_location() + offset;
1394  }
1395  g->place_player_overmap( where );
1396 
1397  const tripoint_abs_om new_pos =
1398  project_to<coords::om>( player_character.global_omt_location() );
1399  add_msg( _( "You teleport to overmap %s." ), new_pos.to_string() );
1400 }
1401 
1402 static void teleport_city()
1403 {
1404  std::vector<city> cities( city::get_all() );
1405  const auto cities_cmp_population = []( const city & a, const city & b ) {
1406  return std::tie( a.population, a.name ) > std::tie( b.population, b.name );
1407  };
1408  std::sort( cities.begin(), cities.end(), cities_cmp_population );
1409  uilist cities_menu;
1410  ui::omap::setup_cities_menu( cities_menu, cities );
1411  std::optional<city> c = ui::omap::select_city( cities_menu, cities, false );
1412  if( c.has_value() ) {
1413  const tripoint_abs_omt where = tripoint_abs_omt(
1414  project_to<coords::omt>( c->pos_om ) + c->pos.raw(), 0 );
1415  g->place_player_overmap( where );
1416  }
1417 }
1418 
1419 static void spawn_nested_mapgen()
1420 {
1421  uilist nest_menu;
1422  std::vector<nested_mapgen_id> nest_ids;
1423  for( auto &nested : nested_mapgens ) {
1424  nest_menu.addentry( -1, true, -1, nested.first.str() );
1425  nest_ids.push_back( nested.first );
1426  }
1427  nest_menu.query();
1428  const int nest_choice = nest_menu.ret;
1429  if( nest_choice >= 0 && nest_choice < static_cast<int>( nest_ids.size() ) ) {
1430  const std::optional<tripoint> where = g->look_around();
1431  if( !where ) {
1432  return;
1433  }
1434 
1435  map &here = get_map();
1436  const tripoint_abs_ms abs_ms( here.getabs( *where ) );
1437  const tripoint_abs_omt abs_omt = project_to<coords::omt>( abs_ms );
1438  const tripoint_abs_sm abs_sub = project_to<coords::sm>( abs_ms );
1439 
1440  map target_map;
1441  target_map.load( abs_sub, true );
1442  const tripoint local_ms = target_map.getlocal( abs_ms );
1443  mapgendata md( abs_omt, target_map, 0.0f, calendar::turn, nullptr );
1444  const auto &ptr = nested_mapgens[nest_ids[nest_choice]].funcs().pick();
1445  if( ptr == nullptr ) {
1446  return;
1447  }
1448  ( *ptr )->nest( md, tripoint_rel_ms( local_ms.x, local_ms.y, 0 ), "debug menu" );
1449  target_map.save();
1450  g->load_npcs();
1451  here.invalidate_map_cache( here.get_abs_sub().z() );
1452  }
1453 }

1622 static void character_edit_hp_menu( Character &you )
1623 {
1624  uilist smenu;
1625  int pos = 0;
1626  char hotkey = 'a';
1627  std::vector<bodypart_id> part_ids = you.get_all_body_parts( get_body_part_flags::only_main );
1628  for( bodypart_id part_id : part_ids ) {
1629  smenu.addentry( pos, true, hotkey, "%s: %d", part_id->name, you.get_part_hp_cur( part_id ) );
1630  pos++;
1631  hotkey++;
1632  }
1633  smenu.addentry( pos, true, hotkey, "%s: %d", _( "All" ), you.get_lowest_hp() );
1634  part_ids.emplace_back( body_part_bp_null );
1635  smenu.query();
1636  bodypart_str_id bp = body_part_no_a_real_part;
1637  bool all_select = false;
1638 
1639  if( smenu.ret > static_cast<int>( part_ids.size() ) || smenu.ret < 0 ) {
1640  return;
1641  }
1642  bp = part_ids.at( smenu.ret ).id();
1643  if( bp == body_part_bp_null ) {
1644  all_select = true;
1645  }
1646 
1647  if( bp.is_valid() && bp != body_part_bp_null ) {
1648  int value;
1649  if( query_int( value, _( "Set the hitpoints to? Currently: %d" ),
1650  you.get_part_hp_cur( bp.id() ) ) &&
1651  value >= 0 ) {
1652  you.set_part_hp_cur( bp.id(), value );
1653  you.reset_stats();
1654  }
1655  } else if( all_select ) {
1656  int value;
1657  if( query_int( value, _( "Set the hitpoints to? Currently: %d" ), you.get_lowest_hp() ) &&
1658  value >= 0 ) {
1659  for( bodypart_id part_id : you.get_all_body_parts( get_body_part_flags::only_main ) ) {
1660  you.set_part_hp_cur( part_id, value );
1661  }
1662  you.reset_stats();
1663  }
1664  }
1665 }

1765  smenu.addentry( 4, true, 'b', "%s: %s", _( "Current blood type" ), current_bloodt );
1766  smenu.query();
1767  switch( smenu.ret ) {
1768  case 0: {

1773  .width( 85 )
1774  .edit( filterstring );
1775  if( popup.confirmed() ) {
1776  get_avatar().set_save_id( filterstring );
1777  }
1778  }
1779  break;
1780  case 1: {
1781  std::string filterstring = you.name;
1782  string_input_popup popup;
1783  popup
1784  .title( _( "Rename character:" ) )
1785  .width( 85 )
1786  .edit( filterstring );
1787  if( popup.confirmed() ) {
1788  you.name = filterstring;
1789  }
1790  }
1791  break;

1795  .text( string_format( "%d", you.base_age() ) )
1796  .only_digits( true );

1798  if( result != 0 ) {
1799  you.set_base_age( clamp( result, 16, 55 ) );
1800  }
1801  }
1802  break;
1803  case 3: {

1805  popup.title( string_format( _( "Enter height in centimeters. Minimum %d, maximum %d" ),
1806  Character::min_height(),
1807  Character::max_height() ) )
1808  .text( string_format( "%d", you.base_height() ) )
1809  .only_digits( true );

1813  }
1814  }

1819  btype.addentry( static_cast<int>( blood_type::blood_O ), true, '1', "O" );

1842 static faction *select_faction()
1843 {
1844  std::vector<faction *> factions;
1845  for( const auto &elem : g->faction_manager_ptr->all() ) {
1846  factions.push_back( g->faction_manager_ptr->get( elem.first ) );
1847  }
1848 
1849  if( factions.empty() ) {
1850  return nullptr;
1851  }
1852 
1853  uilist factionlist;
1854  int facnum = 0;
1855  for( const faction *faction : factions ) {
1856  factionlist.addentry( facnum++, true, MENU_AUTOASSIGN, "%s", faction->name.c_str() );
1857  }
1858 
1859  factionlist.w_y_setup = 0;
1860  factionlist.query();
1861  if( factionlist.ret < 0 || static_cast<size_t>( factionlist.ret ) >= factions.size() ) {
1862  return nullptr;
1863  }
1864 
1865  return factions[factionlist.ret];
1866 }

1868 static void character_edit_menu()

2318 static void faction_edit_larder_menu( faction *fac )
2319 {
2320  uilist smenu;
2321  smenu.addentry( 0, true, 'l', _( "kcal: have stored %i" ), fac->food_supply.kcal() );
2322  const auto &vits = vitamin::all();
2323  for( const auto &v : vits ) {
2324  smenu.addentry( -1, true, 0, _( "%s: have stored %d" ), v.second.name(),
2325  fac->food_supply.get_vitamin( v.first ) );
2326  }
2327 
2328  smenu.query();
2329  int value;
2330  switch( smenu.ret ) {
2331  case 0:
2332  if( query_int( value, _( "Change food from %d to: " ), fac->food_supply.kcal() ) ) {
2333  fac->food_supply.calories = ( value * 1000 );
2334  }
2335  break;
2336  default:
2337  if( smenu.ret >= 1 && smenu.ret < static_cast<int>( vits.size() + 1 ) ) {
2338  auto iter = std::next( vits.begin(), smenu.ret - 1 );
2339  if( query_int( value, _( "Set %s to? Currently: %d" ),
2340  iter->second.name(), fac->food_supply.get_vitamin( iter->first ) ) ) {
2341  fac->food_supply.set_vitamin( iter->first, value );
2342  }
2343  }
2344  }
2345 }

2347 static void faction_edit_menu()
2348 {
2349 
2350  faction *const fac = select_faction();
2351 
2352  if( fac == nullptr ) {
2353  return;
2354  }
2355 
2356  uilist nmenu;
2357

2362  data << string_format( _( "Wealth: %d" ), fac->wealth ) << " | "
2363  << string_format( _( "Currency: %s" ), fac->currency.obj().nname( fac->wealth ) ) << std::endl;
2364  data << string_format( _( "Size: %d" ), fac->size ) << " | "
2365  << string_format( _( "Power: %d" ), fac->power ) << " | "
2366  << string_format( _( "Food Supply: %d" ), fac->food_supply.kcal() ) << std::endl;
2367  data << string_format( _( "Like: %d" ), fac->likes_u ) << " | "
2368  << string_format( _( "Respect: %d" ), fac->respects_u ) << " | "
2369  << string_format( _( "Trust: %d" ), fac->trusts_u ) << std::endl;
2370  data << string_format( _( "Known by you: %s" ), fac->known_by_u ? "true" : "false" ) << " | "
2371  << string_format( _( "Lone wolf: %s" ), fac->lone_wolf_faction ? "true" : "false" ) << std::endl;
2372 
2373  nmenu.text = data.str();
2374 
2375  enum {
2376  D_WEALTH, D_SIZE, D_POWER, D_FOOD, D_OPINION, D_KNOWN, D_LONE
2377  };
2378  nmenu.addentry( D_WEALTH, true, 'w', "%s", _( "Set wealth" ) );
2379  nmenu.addentry( D_SIZE, true, 's', "%s", _( "Set size" ) );
2380  nmenu.addentry( D_POWER, true, 'p', "%s", _( "Set power" ) );
2381  nmenu.addentry( D_FOOD, true, 'f', "%s", _( "Set food supply" ) );
2382  nmenu.addentry( D_OPINION, true, 'o', "%s", _( "Set opinions" ) );
2383  nmenu.addentry( D_KNOWN, true, 'k', "%s", _( "Toggle Known by you" ) );
2384  nmenu.addentry( D_LONE, true, 'l', "%s", _( "Toggle Lone wolf" ) );
2385 
2386  nmenu.query();
2387  int value;
2388  switch( nmenu.ret ) {
2389  case D_WEALTH:
2390  if( query_int( value, _( "Change wealth from %d to: " ), fac->wealth ) ) {
2391  fac->wealth = value;
2392  }
2393  break;
2394  case D_SIZE:
2395  if( query_int( value, _( "Change size from %d to: " ), fac->size ) ) {
2396  fac->size = value;
2397  }
2398  break;
2399  case D_POWER:
2400  if( query_int( value, _( "Change power from %d to: " ), fac->power ) ) {
2401  fac->power = value;
2402  }
2403  break;
2404  case D_FOOD:
2405  faction_edit_larder_menu( fac );
2406  break;
2407  case D_OPINION:
2408  faction_edit_opinion_menu( fac );
2409  break;
2410  case D_KNOWN:
2411  fac->known_by_u = !fac->known_by_u;
2412  break;
2413  case D_LONE:
2414  fac->lone_wolf_faction = !fac->lone_wolf_faction;
2415  break;
2416  }
2417 }

2419 static std::string mission_status_string( mission::mission_status status )
2420 {
2421  static const std::map<mission::mission_status, std::string> desc{ {
2422  { mission::mission_status::yet_to_start, translate_marker( "Yet to start" ) },
2423  { mission::mission_status::in_progress, translate_marker( "In progress" ) },
2424  { mission::mission_status::success, translate_marker( "Success" ) },
2425  { mission::mission_status::failure, translate_marker( "Failure" ) }
2426  }
2427  };
2428 
2429  const auto &iter = desc.find( status );
2430  if( iter != desc.end() ) {
2431  return _( iter->second );
2432  }
2433 
2434  return _( "Bugged" );
2435 }
2436 
2437 std::string mission_debug::describe( const mission &m )
2438 {
2439  std::stringstream data;
2440  data << _( "Type:" ) << m.type->id.str();
2441  data << _( " Status:" ) << mission_status_string( m.status );
2442  data << _( " ID:" ) << m.uid;
2443  data << _( " NPC ID:" ) << m.npc_id;
2444  data << _( " Target:" ) << m.target.to_string();
2445  data << _( "Player ID:" ) << m.player_id;
2446 
2447  return data.str();
2448 }

2450 static void add_header( uilist &mmenu, const std::string &str )
2451 {

2456  header.force_color = true;
2457  mmenu.entries.push_back( header );
2458 }

2531 static bool remove_from_vec( std::vector<mission *> &vec, mission *m )
2532 {
2533  auto iter = std::remove( vec.begin(), vec.end(), m );
2534  bool ret = iter != vec.end();
2535  vec.erase( iter, vec.end() );
2536  return ret;
2537 }
2538 
2539 void mission_debug::remove_mission( mission &m )
2540 {
2541  avatar &player_character = get_avatar();
2542  if( remove_from_vec( player_character.active_missions, &m ) ) {
2543  add_msg( _( "Removing from active_missions" ) );
2544  }
2545  if( remove_from_vec( player_character.completed_missions, &m ) ) {
2546  add_msg( _( "Removing from completed_missions" ) );
2547  }
2548  if( remove_from_vec( player_character.failed_missions, &m ) ) {
2549  add_msg( _( "Removing from failed_missions" ) );
2550  }
2551 
2552  if( player_character.active_mission == &m ) {
2553  player_character.active_mission = nullptr;
2554  add_msg( _( "Unsetting current objective" ) );
2555  }
2556 
2557  npc *giver = g->find_npc( m.npc_id );
2558  if( giver != nullptr ) {
2559  if( remove_from_vec( giver->chatbin.missions_assigned, &m ) ) {
2560  add_msg( _( "Removing from %s missions_assigned" ), giver->get_name() );
2561  }
2562  if( remove_from_vec( giver->chatbin.missions, &m ) ) {
2563  add_msg( _( "Removing from %s missions" ), giver->get_name() );
2564  }
2565  }
2566 }

2568 void mission_debug::edit_mission( mission &m )
2569 {
2570  uilist mmenu;
2571  mmenu.text = describe( m );
2572 
2573  enum {
2574  M_FAIL, M_SUCCEED, M_REMOVE
2575  };
2576 
2577  mmenu.addentry( M_FAIL, true, 'f', "%s", _( "Fail mission" ) );
2578  mmenu.addentry( M_SUCCEED, true, 'c', "%s", _( "Mark as complete" ) );
2579  mmenu.addentry( M_REMOVE, true, 'r', "%s", _( "Remove mission without proper cleanup" ) );
2580 
2581  mmenu.query();
2582  switch( mmenu.ret ) {
2583  case M_FAIL:
2584  m.fail();
2585  break;
2586  case M_SUCCEED:
2587  m.status = mission::mission_status::success;
2588  break;
2589  case M_REMOVE:
2590  remove_mission( m );
2591  break;
2592  }
2593 }

2595 static void draw_benchmark( const int max_difference )
2596 {
2597  // call the draw procedure as many times as possible in max_difference milliseconds
2598  std::chrono::steady_clock::time_point start_tick = std::chrono::steady_clock::now();
2599  std::chrono::steady_clock::time_point end_tick = std::chrono::steady_clock::now();
2600  int64_t difference = 0;
2601  int draw_counter = 0;
2602 
2603  static_popup popup;
2604  popup.on_top( true ).message( "%s", _( "Benchmark in progress" ) );
2605 
2606  while( true ) {
2607  end_tick = std::chrono::steady_clock::now();
2608  difference = std::chrono::duration_cast<std::chrono::milliseconds>( end_tick - start_tick ).count();
2609  if( difference >= max_difference ) {
2610  break;
2611  }
2612  g->invalidate_main_ui_adaptor();
2613  inp_mngr.pump_events();
2614  ui_manager::redraw_invalidated();
2615  refresh_display();
2616  draw_counter++;
2617  }
2618 
2619  DebugLog( D_INFO, DC_ALL ) << "Draw benchmark:\n" <<
2620  "\n| USE_TILES | RENDERER | FRAMEBUFFER_ACCEL | USE_COLOR_MODULATED_TEXTURES | FPS |" <<
2621  "\n|:---:|:---:|:---:|:---:|:---:|\n| " <<
2622  get_option<bool>( "USE_TILES" ) << " | " <<
2623 #if !defined(__ANDROID__)
2624  get_option<std::string>( "RENDERER" ) << " | " <<
2625 #else
2626  get_option<bool>( "SOFTWARE_RENDERING" ) << " | " <<
2627 #endif
2628  get_option<bool>( "FRAMEBUFFER_ACCEL" ) << " | " <<
2629  get_option<bool>( "USE_COLOR_MODULATED_TEXTURES" ) << " | " <<
2630  static_cast<int>( 1000.0 * draw_counter / static_cast<double>( difference ) ) << " |\n";
2631 
2632  add_msg( m_info, _( "Drew %d times in %.3f seconds. (%.3f fps average)" ), draw_counter,
2633  difference / 1000.0, 1000.0 * draw_counter / static_cast<double>( difference ) );
2634 }

2637 {

2639  map &here = get_map();
2640  tripoint_abs_sm abs_sub = here.get_abs_sub();
2641  popup( player_character.total_daily_calories_string() );

2644  s += _( "Current turn: %d.\n" );

2646 
2647  std::unordered_map<std::string, int> creature_counts;

2649  std::string this_name = critter.get_name();
2650  creature_counts[this_name]++;
2651  }

2653  if( !creature_counts.empty() ) {

2679  t.y(), guy.posx(), guy.posy() );

2703 static void debug_menu_spawn_vehicle()
2704 {
2705  avatar &player_character = get_avatar();
2706  map &here = get_map();
2707  if( here.veh_at( player_character.pos() ) ) {
2708  dbg( D_ERROR ) << "game:load: There's already vehicle here";
2709  debugmsg( "There's already vehicle here" );
2710  } else {
2711  // Vector of name, id so that we can sort by name
2712  std::vector<std::pair<std::string, vproto_id>> veh_strings;
2713  for( const vehicle_prototype &proto : vehicles::get_all_prototypes() ) {
2714  if( !proto.parts.empty() ) {
2715  veh_strings.emplace_back( proto.name.translated(), proto.id );
2716  }
2717  }
2718  std::sort( veh_strings.begin(), veh_strings.end(), localized_compare );
2719  uilist veh_menu;
2720  veh_menu.text = _( "Choose vehicle to spawn" );
2721  int menu_ind = 0;
2722  for( auto &elem : veh_strings ) {
2723  //~ Menu entry in vehicle wish menu: 1st string: displayed name, 2nd string: internal name of vehicle
2724  veh_menu.addentry( menu_ind, true, MENU_AUTOASSIGN, _( "%1$s (%2$s)" ),
2725  elem.first, elem.second.c_str() );
2726  ++menu_ind;
2727  }
2728  veh_menu.query();
2729  if( veh_menu.ret >= 0 && veh_menu.ret < static_cast<int>( veh_strings.size() ) ) {
2730  // Didn't cancel
2731  const vproto_id &selected_opt = veh_strings[veh_menu.ret].second;
2732  tripoint dest = player_character.pos();
2733  uilist veh_cond_menu;
2734  veh_cond_menu.text = _( "Vehicle condition" );
2735  veh_cond_menu.addentry( 3, true, MENU_AUTOASSIGN, _( "Undamaged" ) );
2736  veh_cond_menu.addentry( 0, true, MENU_AUTOASSIGN, _( "Light damage" ) );
2737  veh_cond_menu.addentry( 2, true, MENU_AUTOASSIGN, _( "Disabled (tires or engine)" ) );
2738  veh_cond_menu.query();
2739 
2740  if( veh_cond_menu.ret >= 0 && veh_cond_menu.ret < 4 ) {
2741  // TODO: Allow picking this when add_vehicle has 3d argument
2742  vehicle *veh = here.add_vehicle(
2743  selected_opt, dest, -90_degrees, 100, veh_cond_menu.ret - 1 );
2744  if( veh != nullptr ) {
2745  here.board_vehicle( dest, &player_character );
2746  }
2747  }
2748  }
2749  }
2750 }

2752 static void debug_menu_force_temperature()
2753 {
2754  uilist tempmenu;
2755  std::optional<units::temperature> &forced_temp = get_weather().forced_temperature;
2756 
2757  tempmenu.addentry( 0, forced_temp.has_value(), MENU_AUTOASSIGN, _( "Reset" ) );
2758  tempmenu.addentry( 1, true, MENU_AUTOASSIGN, _( "Set" ) );
2759  tempmenu.query();
2760  if( tempmenu.ret == 0 ) {
2761  forced_temp.reset();
2762  } else {
2763  string_input_popup pop;
2764 
2765  auto ask = [&pop]( const std::string & unit, std::optional<float> current ) {
2766  int ret = pop.title( string_format( _( "Set temperature to? [%s]" ), unit ) )
2767  .width( 20 )
2768  .text( current ? std::to_string( *current ) : "" )
2769  .only_digits( true )
2770  .query_int();
2771 
2772  return pop.canceled() ? current : std::optional<float>( static_cast<float>( ret ) );
2773  };
2774 
2775  std::optional<float> current;
2776  std::string option = get_option<std::string>( "USE_CELSIUS" );
2777 
2778  if( option == "celsius" ) {
2779  if( forced_temp ) {
2780  current = units::to_celsius( *forced_temp );
2781  }
2782  std::optional<float> ret = ask( "C", current );
2783  if( ret ) {
2784  forced_temp = units::from_celsius( *ret );
2785  }
2786  } else if( option == "kelvin" ) {
2787  if( forced_temp ) {
2788  current = units::to_kelvin( *forced_temp );
2789  }
2790  std::optional<float> ret = ask( "K", current );
2791  if( ret ) {
2792  forced_temp = units::from_kelvin( *ret );
2793  }
2794  } else {
2795  if( forced_temp ) {
2796  current = units::to_fahrenheit( *forced_temp );
2797  }
2798  std::optional<float> ret = ask( "F", current );
2799  if( ret ) {
2800  forced_temp = units::from_fahrenheit( *ret );
2801  }
2802  }
2803  }
2804 }

2806 static npc *select_follower_to_export()
2807 {
2808  std::vector<npc *> followers;
2809  uilist charmenu;
2810  int charnum = 0;
2811  for( const character_id &elem : g->get_follower_list() ) {
2812  shared_ptr_fast<npc> follower = overmap_buffer.find_npc( elem );
2813  if( follower ) {
2814  followers.emplace_back( follower.get() );
2815  charmenu.addentry( charnum++, true, MENU_AUTOASSIGN, follower->get_name() );
2816  }
2817  }
2818  if( followers.empty() ) {
2819  popup( _( "There's no one to export!" ) );
2820  return nullptr;
2821  }
2822  charmenu.w_y_setup = 0;
2823  charmenu.query();
2824  if( charmenu.ret < 0 || static_cast<size_t>( charmenu.ret ) >= followers.size() ) {
2825  return nullptr;
2826  }
2827  return followers[charmenu.ret];
2828 }

2830 static cata_path prepare_export_dir_and_find_unused_name( const std::string &character_name )
2831 {
2832  cata_path export_dir{ cata_path::root_path::user, "export_dir" };
2833  assure_dir_exist( export_dir );
2834  cata_path ret = export_dir / ( character_name + ".npc" );
2835  int try_next = 1;
2836  while( file_exist( ret ) ) {
2837  ret = export_dir / ( character_name + " " + std::to_string( try_next ) + ".npc" );
2838  try_next++;
2839  }
2840  return ret;
2841 }

2861 static void bleed_self()
2862 {
2863  uilist smenu;
2864  smenu.addentry( 0, true, 'q', _( "Torso" ) );
2865  smenu.addentry( 1, true, 'w', _( "Head" ) );
2866  smenu.addentry( 2, true, 'a', _( "Left arm" ) );
2867  smenu.addentry( 3, true, 's', _( "Right arm" ) );
2868  smenu.addentry( 4, true, 'z', _( "Left leg" ) );
2869  smenu.addentry( 5, true, 'x', _( "Right leg" ) );
2870  smenu.query();
2871  bodypart_id part;
2872  int intensity = 0;
2873  switch( smenu.ret ) {
2874  case 0:
2875  part = bodypart_id( "torso" );
2876  break;
2877  case 1:
2878  part = bodypart_id( "head" );
2879  break;
2880  case 2:
2881  part = bodypart_id( "arm_l" );
2882  break;
2883  case 3:
2884  part = bodypart_id( "arm_r" );
2885  break;
2886  case 4:
2887  part = bodypart_id( "leg_l" );
2888  break;
2889  case 5:
2890  part = bodypart_id( "leg_r" );
2891  break;
2892  default:
2893  break;
2894  }
2895  if( query_int( intensity, _( "Add bleeding duration in minutes, equal to intensity:" ) ) ) {
2896  get_avatar().add_effect( effect_bleed, 1_minutes * intensity, part );
2897  }
2898 }

2900 static void change_weather()
2901 {

2905  weather_menu.text = _( "Select new weather pattern:" );

2909  weather_menu.addentry( i, true, MENU_AUTOASSIGN,
2910  wgen.sorted_weather[i]->name.translated() );
2911  }

2916  static_cast<size_t>( weather_menu.ret ) < wgen.sorted_weather.size() ) {
2917  const weather_type_id selected_weather = wgen.sorted_weather[weather_menu.ret]->id;

2920  effect_on_condition_id( weather.weather_id->debug_leave_eoc.value() )->activate( d );

2927  weather.set_nextweather( calendar::turn );
2928  }

2931 static void damage_self()
2932 {
2933  avatar &player_character = get_avatar();
2934  const std::vector<bodypart_id> parts = player_character.get_all_body_parts(
2935  get_body_part_flags::only_main );
2936  uilist smenu;
2937  int i = 0;
2938  for( const bodypart_id &part : parts ) {
2939  smenu.addentry( i, true, ' ', "%s: %d",
2940  part->name.translated(), player_character.get_part_hp_cur( part ) );
2941  i++;
2942  }
2943  smenu.query();
2944  bodypart_id part;
2945  int dbg_damage;
2946  if( smenu.ret >= 0 && static_cast<std::size_t>( smenu.ret ) <= parts.size() ) {
2947  part = parts[smenu.ret];
2948  }
2949  if( query_int( dbg_damage, _( "Damage self for how much? HP: %s" ), part.id().c_str() ) ) {
2950  player_character.apply_damage( nullptr, part, dbg_damage );
2951  if( player_character.is_dead_state() ) {
2952  player_character.die( nullptr );
2953  }
2954  }
2955 }

2975 static void game_report()
2976 {
2977  // generate a game report, useful for bug reporting.
2978  std::string report = game_info::game_report();
2979  // write to log
2980  DebugLog( DL_ALL, DC_ALL ) << " GAME REPORT:\n" << report;

3030 static void import_folower()
3031 {
3032  cata_path export_dir{ cata_path::root_path::user, "export_dir" };
3033  std::vector<cata_path> npc_files = get_files_from_path( ".npc",
3034  export_dir, /* recursive_search */ false, /* match_extension */ true );
3035  if( npc_files.empty() ) {
3036  popup( _( "There's no NPCs to import!" ) );
3037  return;
3038  }
3039  uilist filemenu;
3040  int filenum = 0;
3041  for( const cata_path &path : npc_files ) {
3042  filemenu.addentry( filenum++, true, MENU_AUTOASSIGN, path.get_unrelative_path().stem().string() );
3043  }
3044  filemenu.w_y_setup = 0;
3045  filemenu.query();
3046  if( filemenu.ret < 0 || static_cast<size_t>( filemenu.ret ) >= npc_files.size() ) {
3047  return;
3048  }
3049  try {
3050  shared_ptr_fast<npc> temp = make_shared_fast<npc>();
3051  temp->import_and_clean( npc_files[filemenu.ret] );
3052  g->add_npc_follower( temp->getID() );
3053  temp->set_attitude( NPCATT_FOLLOW );
3054  temp->set_fac( faction_your_followers );
3055  temp->spawn_at_precise( get_avatar().get_location() + point( -4, -4 ) );
3056  overmap_buffer.insert_npc( temp );
3057  g->load_npcs();
3058  } catch( const std::exception &err ) {
3059  debugmsg( _( "Failed to read NPC: %s" ), err.what() );
3060  }
3061 }

3063 static void kill_area()

3068 
3069  tripoint initial_pos = get_avatar().pos();

3071  false, true, false );
3072 
3073  if( !first.position ) {
3074  return;
3075  }
3076 
3077  popup.message( "%s", _( "Select second point." ) );
3078  const look_around_result second = g->look_around( false, initial_pos, *first.position,
3079  true, true, false );
3080 
3081  if( !second.position ) {
3082  return;
3083  }
3084

3086  first.position.value(), second.position.value() );
3087 
3088  std::vector<Creature *> creatures = g->get_creatures_if(
3089  [&points]( const Creature & critter ) -> bool {
3090  return !critter.is_avatar() && points.is_point_inside( critter.pos() );
3091  } );
3092 
3093  for( Creature *critter : creatures ) {
3094  critter->die( nullptr );
3095  }
3096 
3097  g->cleanup_dead();
3098 }

3358 void debug()
3359 {
3360  bool debug_menu_has_hotkey = hotkey_for_action( ACTION_DEBUG,
3361  /*maximum_modifier_count=*/ -1, false ).has_value();
3362  std::optional<debug_menu_index> action = debug_menu_uilist( debug_menu_has_hotkey );
3363 
3364  // For the "cheaty" options, disable achievements when used
3365  achievements_tracker &achievements = get_achievements();
3366  static const std::unordered_set<debug_menu_index> non_cheaty_options = {
3367  debug_menu_index::SAVE_SCREENSHOT,
3368  debug_menu_index::GAME_REPORT,
3369  debug_menu_index::GAME_MIN_ARCHIVE,
3370  debug_menu_index::ENABLE_ACHIEVEMENTS,
3371  debug_menu_index::UNLOCK_ALL,
3372  debug_menu_index::BENCHMARK,
3373  debug_menu_index::SHOW_MSG,
3374  debug_menu_index::QUICKLOAD,
3375  debug_menu_index::QUIT_NOSAVE,
3376  debug_menu_index::EXPORT_FOLLOWER,
3377  debug_menu_index::EXPORT_SELF
3378  };
3379  const bool should_disable_achievements = action && !is_debug_character() &&
3380  !non_cheaty_options.count( *action );
3381  if( should_disable_achievements && achievements.is_enabled() ) {
3382  static const std::string query(
3383  translate_marker(
3384  "Using this will disable achievements. Proceed?"
3385  "\nThey can be reenabled in the 'game' section of the menu." ) );

3387  achievements.set_enabled( false );

3389  action = std::nullopt;
3390  }
3391  }
3392 
3393  if( !action ) {
3394  return;
3395  }

3397  get_event_bus().send<event_type::uses_debug_menu>( *action );

3399  // Used for quick setup, constructed outside the switches to reduce duplicate code

3401  trait_DEBUG_HS, trait_DEBUG_LIGHT, trait_DEBUG_LS, trait_DEBUG_MANA, trait_DEBUG_MIND_CONTROL,
3402  trait_DEBUG_NODMG, trait_DEBUG_NOTEMP, trait_DEBUG_STAMINA, trait_DEBUG_SPEED};
3403 
3404  avatar &player_character = get_avatar();
3405  map &here = get_map();
3406  switch( *action ) {
3407  case debug_menu_index::WISH:
3408  debug_menu::wishitem( &player_character );
3409  break;

3425  }
